sources.name: import_csv_from_blob
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  import_csv_from_blob

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared import_csv_from_blob = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://coursedatalake.blob.core.windows.net/raw-load/train.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = import_csv_from_blob
in
  Source;
